name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Playcast.ai: Text-To-Speech For Your Reading List

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert articles, essays, PDFs, and more into audio summaries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Playcast lets you listen to your favorite articles, essays, and even books as podcasts while you are driving, in the gym, or cooking.

🎧 Get to the point, listen to what matters
🙌 Keep up with your reading list
🖥️ Reduce screen time
👯‍♂️ Share with friends
